title: Queen Size Platform Bed
brief_description: Modern Minimalist Bed Frame
description: Experience sleek and minimalist design with our queen size platform bed.
full_description: Add a touch of modern elegance to your bedroom with our platform bed frame. Crafted from sturdy wood, it features a low-profile design with clean lines, offering a contemporary look that complements any decor style. The platform slats provide ample support for your mattress, ensuring a comfortable night's sleep.
additional_information: Available in multiple finishes. Easy assembly required. Mattress sold separately.

title: King Size Storage Bed
brief_description: Functional Bed Frame with Storage
description: Maximize your bedroom space with our king size storage bed.
full_description: Optimize your bedroom organization with our storage bed frame. Featuring built-in drawers underneath, it offers ample space to store extra bedding, clothing, or other essentials, keeping your room tidy and clutter-free. The sturdy construction and stylish design make it a practical and aesthetic addition to any bedroom.
additional_information: Four spacious drawers. Available in oak or espresso finish. Assembly required.

title: Twin Size Bunk Bed
brief_description: Space-Saving Solution for Kids' Rooms
description: Provide versatile sleeping options with our twin size bunk bed.
full_description: Maximize floor space and add fun to your kids' room with our bunk bed. Built with safety in mind, it features sturdy wood construction and guardrails on the top bunk for added security. The classic design and neutral finish blend seamlessly with any decor, making it a practical and stylish choice.
additional_information: Separates into two twin beds. Ladder included. Mattresses not included.
